name: Courier
description:
Assume the role of an intergalactic delivery boy chasing an ancient artifact with the power to create galaxies from nothing. Deliver cargo across 6 different galaxies to gain cash in order to buy your ticket to the galaxy known as Paradise to defeat the Gemkeeper, protector of the artifact, as well as ally yourself with one of four unique factions along the way.

Credits
Created with GameMaker:Studio 1.4
Sounds made with Chiptone and sfxr
Music made with Bosca Ceoil
